授業目的:
The main purpose of this course is to help students develop more conversation and discussion skills at the intermediate or B1/B1+ level. The secondary purpose is to help improve students’ ability to discuss various topics in English and improve student vocabulary.

In each lesson, students will develop their ability to communicate in English by speaking in pairs or in small groups. The content of the lesson is based on the textbook, but students will sometimes participate in extra communication activities. Students should be prepared for frequent discussion activities, in which they will learn and practice appropriate language for a range of communication situations (for example: asking for opinions, expressing opinions, disagreeing, offering advice, persuading others, etc.). Students will be expected to participate in an 'English only' learning environment.

到達目標:
By the end of the fall semester:

1. Students will be more comfortable with speaking and expressing their opinions on various topics presented in the course.
2. Students will be able to present on various topics raised in the course.
3. Students will become more familiar with personal and social issues in society.
4. Students will gain more confidence in communicating with the English language.
5. Students will develop more critical thinking skills.
6. Students will develop some skills for academic writing.
7. Students should be more proficient at the A2, B1, B1+ level based on the CEFR scale.

By the end of the course, students will develop more conversation and discussion skills at the intermediate or B1/B1+ level.
授業の概要・背景: Classes will have the instructor introduce the topic, an activity to help students prepare for the situation described in the book, reading comprehension, facilitating of student opinions and help with students in talking about the topic. The class will conclude with students being able to share their own ideas. As the course continues, the class may become more student-centered, and student led depending on proficiency. The instructor will be a facilitator of various tasks to help students communicate with each other in English. There will be ample opportunity for pair work. The content of the lesson is based on the textbook, but students will sometimes participate in extra communication activities. Students should be prepared for frequent discussion activities, in which they will learn and practice appropriate language for a range of communication situations (for example: asking for opinions, expressing opinions, disagreeing, offering advice, persuading others, etc.). Students will be expected to participate in an 'English only' learning environment.
授業方法:
We will be a face-to-face class. 

Discussion: Students hold discussions in class. In addition to discussions between pairs of students, group discussions are sometimes held as well.

Presentation: As the main activities, students summarize the results of their own learning activities and present them.

Pair work: Students perform learning activities in pairs.

Group work: Students make groups of three members or more to perform learning activities.
